# PTPT

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/apeterson91/PTPT/workflows/R-CMD-check/badge.svg)](https://github.com/apeterson91/PTPT/actions)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of PTPT is to inform transit policy in the city of Pittsburgh. In particular those areas of 
transit that reduce car-dependency.

## Installation

You can install the development version of PTPT from github via:

``` r
remotes::install_github("apeterson91/PTPT")
```

## Details


This project is in the early stages of active development. Stay tuned for further updates.
